entry.message: [info] Activation of plug-in DQC Rules Validator successful, version Check version using Tools->DQC->Version on the GUI or --dqc-version on the command line. - validate/DQC
[info] Activation of plug-in SEC Inline Transforms successful, version 19.2. - EDGAR/transform

[DQC.US.0124.9587] The element us-gaap:FinanceLeaseRightOfUseAsset with a value of 401,680,000 has been used in the filing but does not appear in the financial statements of the filing. This disclosure should appear in the face financials unless it is included in another account caption. If this is the case either: 1. The element FinanceLeaseRightOfUseAssetStatementOfFinancialPositionExtensibleList should be used to identify the account where the Finance Lease Asset is included; or 2. The Balance Sheet location axis should be used with two or more account members to identify into which financial statement captions the Finance Lease Asset has been apportioned.
Period :2023-12-31 Dimensions : Unit : USD Decimals: -3
Rule Element Id:9587 Rule version: 26.0.9 - bxp-20241231.htm 8

property.name: label
property.value: Finance Lease, Right-of-Use Asset, after Accumulated Amortization

entry.message:
[DQC.US.0124.9587] The element us-gaap:FinanceLeaseRightOfUseAsset with a value of 372,922,000 has been used in the filing but does not appear in the financial statements of the filing. This disclosure should appear in the face financials unless it is included in another account caption. If this is the case either: 1. The element FinanceLeaseRightOfUseAssetStatementOfFinancialPositionExtensibleList should be used to identify the account where the Finance Lease Asset is included; or 2. The Balance Sheet location axis should be used with two or more account members to identify into which financial statement captions the Finance Lease Asset has been apportioned.
Period :2024-12-31 Dimensions : Unit : USD Decimals: -3
Rule Element Id:9587 Rule version: 26.0.9 - bxp-20241231.htm 8

property.name: label
property.value: Finance Lease, Right-of-Use Asset, after Accumulated Amortization
